Text.Page: The core materials for etchings are scarabs. There are three types you will use again and again in the process of making etchings: straw scarabs, elemental scarabs, and aurora scarabs which can be gathered from plants, minerals and energy respectively. Bring me some of each, and we can proceed.

Good job, .

Now, hand me the design and let's get started.
You won't get anywhere by sitting still. Get moving!
